resources.string: Hey! I\'m now using the star app Starmeo for secure chatting. Download it now and add me as a contact:\n%1$s%2$s\n%3$s

Help us improve Starmeo by sending your crash logs to the development team. Please find detailed information about crash reports in our FAQ.
Crash information available. We kindly ask you to send this information to Starmeo developers and help us improving our service.
Error information available. We kindly ask you to send this information to Starmeo developers and help us improving our service.

Starmeo 
- your secure multimedia messenger

Security, data protection and the protection of privacy are of extreme importance to us. Starmeo sets new standards in mobile data transmission and puts mobile privacy to a whole new level, due to latest encryption and transmission technologies. Starmeo provides an easy and unlimited exchange of data between smartphones and tablets, without constraining users to register and enter confidential data.

Share hugs & kisses
Please re-start Starmeo to complete restoring your account.
Please copy a backup to\n%1$s\nto restore a former Starmeo account.
